title: net/http Request.RequestURI returns the incorrect value
body:
Instead of returning the path up to the query string it includes the query string in the URI, for example:

Instead of this:
* POST /some/path.html?key=value  		/some/path.html
* GET http://foo.bar/a.html?key=value 		/a.html
* HEAD /xyz?a=b HTTP/1.1 		                /xyz

It returns this:
* POST /some/path.html?key=value  		/some/path.html?key=value
* GET http://foo.bar/a.html?key=value 		/a.html?key=value
* HEAD /xyz?a=b HTTP/1.1 		                /xyz?a=b
